#Text=Montreal/Rosemont – La Petite-Patrie
#Text=Rosemont — La Petite-Patrie is an area of Montreal north of the Plateau .
#Text=Unlike in many other North American cities , Montreal 's Little Italy is still authentic and has not seen any tourist-oriented development .
#Text=As such , you can still find many family-owned Italian-Canadian bakeries and restaurants in the area .
#Text=By metro
#Text=Jean-Talon metro is the transfer station for the Blue and Orange line .
#Text=Beaubien is one stop South on the Orange line and De Castelnau is one stop West on the Blue line .
#Text=By bus
#Text=The 55 St-Laurent bus runs from St-Laurent metro station , on the Green line , through the Plateau to De Castelnau .
#Text=Get around
#Text=Little Italy and Marché Jean-Talon are easily covered by foot , but you may prefer to catch the Jean-Talon bus or hop on the metro if you 're exploring the edges of the district .
#Text=Taxis can be a little harder to find than downtown but are still available on the street .
#Text=See
#Text=La Maison d’Italie .
#Text=Dante Park .
#Text=Small park popular for its Bocce court .
#Text=Church of the Madonna della Difesa , 6800 avenue Henri-Julien ( Jean-Talon or Beaubien metro stations ) .
#Text=1900s Romanesque church built to commemorate apparition of the Madonna in La Difesa , in Campobasso , Molise .
#Text=Frescos by Guido Nincheri .
#Text=Buy
#Text=Plaza St. Hubert , rue Saint-Hubert between rue Beaubien est and rue Jean-Talon est ( Beaubien or Jean Talon metro ) .
#Text=Several blocks of discount clothing and household items with a scattering of fast food restaurants and cafes .
#Text=A good place to find bargains , the specialty is bridal gowns and formal wear .
#Text=Eat
#Text=Bombay Mahal , 1001 rue Jean-Talon ouest ( metro L'Acadie ) .
#Text=Excellent dirt-cheap Indian cuisine .
#Text=Pushap , 5195 rue Paré ( metro Namur ) , +1 514-737-4527. Great vegetarian Punjabi food .
#Text=The thali plate makes a big dinner for about $ 5 .
#Text=Be sure to try some of their excellent desserts — they double as a take-out sweet shop .
#Text=Ristorante Lucca , 12 rue Dante , ☏ +1514 278-6502 .
#Text=Pasticceria Alati-Caserta , 277 rue Dante , ☏ +1 514-271-3013 .

#Text=M 10:00 - 17:00 , Tu W 10:00 - 18:00 , Th 10:00 - 19:00 , F 08:00 - 19:30 , Sa 08:00 - 17:00 , Su 09:00-17:00. Italian desserts and pastries , almond cake , Sicilian cannoli , Sfoglitella Napolitana , and biscotti .
#Text=Since 1968 .
#Text=$ 2 - 10 , cash only .
#Text=Marché Jean-Talon
#Text=Le Marché des Saveurs , located near the southeast corner of the market , features Produits du terroir ( local Quebec products ) .
#Text=Fromagerie Hamel , on the north side , has a terrific selection of cheeses and a small bistro with salads , sandwiches , and daily specials ( all featuring cheese of course ! )
#Text=Havre aux Glaces , 7070 , rue Henri-Julien .
#Text=Gelato
#Text=Drink
#Text=Whisky Cafe , 5800 boulevard Saint-Laurent , ☏ +1 514-278-2646 .
#Text=Featuring not just whiskeys but also an extensive wine and port list .
#Text=Whiskey Cafe is adjacent to one of the few cigar lounges in Montreal .
#Text=Vices & Versa Bistro Du Terroir Inc , 6631 boulevard Saint-Laurent , ☏ +1 514-272-2498 .
#Text=Bistro on the edge of Little Italy featuring Quebec cuisine and home-made beer from small microbreweries .
#Text=Brasserie De Nos Aieux , 901 rue Bélanger , ☏ +1 514-274-9765 .
#Text=Sleep
#Text=Accommodations are slim in this mostly residential area .
#Text=À la Carte B&B , 5477 , 10e Avenue ( buses 47 or 67 ) , ☏ +1 514-593-4005 , ✉ dlabrosse@alacartebnb.com .
#Text=Stylish Bed and Breakfast in residential neighbourhood .
#Text=suite $ 110 - studio $ 145 .
